channel.title: IPv6 Routing - David Vargas
channel.description: 3.0 IP Connectivity 3.3 Configure and verify IPv4 and IPv6 static routing 3.3.a Default route 3.3.b Network route 3.3.c Host route 3.3.d Floating static Connected and Local IPv6 Routes a router adds IPv6 routes based on the following: The configuration of IPv6 addresses on working interfaces (connected and local routes) The direct configuration of a static route (static routes) The configuration of a routing protocol, like OSPFv3, on routers that share the same data link (dynamic routes)
